subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Nets, who hit only one of their last seven shots in Monday’s 102-96 loss to the Heat at Barclays Center, are facing elimination in Game 5 in Miami.
snippet: The Nets, who hit only one of their last seven shots in Monday’s 102-96 loss to the Heat at Barclays Center, are facing elimination in Game 5 in Miami.
